item.title: Shuba
item.description: Corporate identity for a company that offers customers ready coats of all kinds of fur, and also engaged in sewing of fur coats. There was chosen classic black and white style. Logo in addition to the basic version has a shorter version, which can be used on small items: buttons, sealing wax seal, etc.
item.content:encoded: Corporate identity for a company that offers customers ready coats of all kinds of fur, and also engaged in sewing of fur coats. There was chosen classic black and white style. Logo in addition to the basic version has a shorter version, which can be used on small items: buttons, sealing wax seal, etc.

item.title: THE FUTURE OF SPORTS
item.description: Sports Advertising Photographer Tim Tadder, and renowned GGi/digital artist Mike Campau teamed up yet again, this time on personal project, to create a unique sports series. Both artists explored sport in nearly every facet throughout their careers and decided it was time spin it completely differently. In order to create a collection of images that were not buried in cliches, Tim and Mike decided to create images voyeuring a new age of the genre. Tim shot the talent in studio, carefully crafting lighting to match playing landscapes and props that were in fact to to be illuminated, all the while capturing the essence of sport in the movements of the athletes. Mike then created the environments and props cgi to match the same lighting and energy. Once the elements were all combined with effects and color grading, the team had a winner of a series.
item.content:encoded: Sports Advertising Photographer Tim Tadder, and renowned GGi/digital artist Mike Campau teamed up yet again, this time on personal project, to create a unique sports series. Both artists explored sport in nearly every facet throughout their careers and decided it was time spin it completely differently. In order to create a collection of images that were not buried in cliches, Tim and Mike decided to create images voyeuring a new age of the genre. Tim shot the talent in studio, carefully crafting lighting to match playing landscapes and props that were in fact to to be illuminated, all the while capturing the essence of sport in the movements of the athletes. Mike then created the environments and props cgi to match the same lighting and energy. Once the elements were all combined with effects and color grading, the team had a winner of a series.

item.description: A stereoscopic interpretation of the Jan Matejko painting, The Battle of Grunwald, which depicts the greatest battle of the Middle Ages, an event that changed the face of Europe.

item.title: YWFT Nim
item.description: YWFT Nim is all about layering. Bevel effects, outline effects, 3d effects, shadow effects--all are possible and uniquely powerful with YWFT Nim, making for a near-infinite amount of variety and style. Modern and clean, with a nod to architectural forms and figures, YWFT Nim is ideal for striking headlines and posters, and declarative of a strong, individual functionality.
item.content:encoded: YWFT Nim is all about layering. Bevel effects, outline effects, 3d effects, shadow effects--all are possible and uniquely powerful with YWFT Nim, making for a near-infinite amount of variety and style. Modern and clean, with a nod to architectural forms and figures, YWFT Nim is ideal for striking headlines and posters, and declarative of a strong, individual functionality.

item.title: Chernobyl Diaries OST / Instruments and Techniques
item.description: Composing the music for "Chernobyl Diaries" gave Diego Stocco the opportunity to experiment with new playing techniques on his custom built instruments, as well as hybrid techniques on electric bass, acoustic and electric guitar, zithers and percussions. The soundctrack evolves through sparse and abstract cues to more melodic ones, including very aggressive and atonal moment. In this gallery you can listen to some extracts from the soundtrack Diego created and see some of the instruments he played.
item.content:encoded: Composing the music for "Chernobyl Diaries" gave Diego Stocco the opportunity to experiment with new playing techniques on his custom built instruments, as well as hybrid techniques on electric bass, acoustic and electric guitar, zithers and percussions. The soundctrack evolves through sparse and abstract cues to more melodic ones, including very aggressive and atonal moment. In this gallery you can listen to some extracts from the soundtrack Diego created and see some of the instruments he played.

item.title: Lovebirds Color Edition
item.description: These are the color edition sets of the Lovebird toy I created for my wedding. They come in four lush color variations and are interchangeable with each other, to create either a matched pair or any two you might choose.

item.title: WE WORK
item.description: WeWork is an office-suite business, with adistinct concept - it constructs space with open floor plans and glass partitioningto enhance tenant interaction which builds a physical social network capabilityresulting in business activities between tenants. Its mission is to createenvironments that support creativity, collaboration and innovation. WeWork hasgrown to six buildings and nearly 2000 members. It wasSquat Designs challenge to create a brand system for all the buildings and thecorporate entity that was not only consistent but also flexible enough to growas WeWork continued to expand in new locations. Additionally, it must be international in scope for WeWorks objectiveto grow internationally. And lastly, theflexibility must be able to expand cross-industry as the WeWork brand branchesout. One of SquatDesigns proposed solutions to this branding challenge was to develop agrid/color system to give each building a separate yet consistent identity. The brand system is edgy, energeticand cool, which reflects the attributes of the target market.
item.content:encoded: WeWork is an office-suite business, with adistinct concept - it constructs space with open floor plans and glass partitioningto enhance tenant interaction which builds a physical social network capabilityresulting in business activities between tenants. Its mission is to createenvironments that support creativity, collaboration and innovation. WeWork hasgrown to six buildings and nearly 2000 members. It wasSquat Designs challenge to create a brand system for all the buildings and thecorporate entity that was not only consistent but also flexible enough to growas WeWork continued to expand in new locations. Additionally, it must be international in scope for WeWorks objectiveto grow internationally. And lastly, theflexibility must be able to expand cross-industry as the WeWork brand branchesout. One of SquatDesigns proposed solutions to this branding challenge was to develop agrid/color system to give each building a separate yet consistent identity. The brand system is edgy, energeticand cool, which reflects the attributes of the target market.

item.title: Infinity Loop Bridge
item.description: 10 DESIGN and Buro Happold have won the international design competition for the key signature gateway bridge for the new Shizimen Business District in Zhuhai, China. The feature bridge is the gateway entry to south Chinas new planned commercial hub and also marks the connection of the Shizimen Canal to the Pearl River Delta. Working together in one of their first collaborations the 10 and Buro Happold team set out to create a simple and elegant structural solution for a bridge that would be a visual focal point both within the Shizimen District itself and along the Pearl River Delta coastline.
item.content:encoded: 10 DESIGN and Buro Happold have won the international design competition for the key signature gateway bridge for the new Shizimen Business District in Zhuhai, China. The feature bridge is the gateway entry to south Chinas new planned commercial hub and also marks the connection of the Shizimen Canal to the Pearl River Delta. Working together in one of their first collaborations the 10 and Buro Happold team set out to create a simple and elegant structural solution for a bridge that would be a visual focal point both within the Shizimen District itself and along the Pearl River Delta coastline.

item.title: livemapp
item.description: Branding, mobile app and website design (including information architecture) for an exciting new social network that allows users to visually share what's going on around them. It's all delivered real-time over an interactive map bringing a new level of context to the genre. The project needed to appeal to the widest audience possible and deliver a smooth and intuitive experience. iPhone app is available as a free download from the App Store.
item.content:encoded: Branding, mobile app and website design (including information architecture) for an exciting new social network that allows users to visually share what's going on around them. It's all delivered real-time over an interactive map bringing a new level of context to the genre. The project needed to appeal to the widest audience possible and deliver a smooth and intuitive experience. iPhone app is available as a free download from the App Store.
